title: Just Another Foundry slashes prices
content:
Get [JAF Facit](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202233415/http:/justanotherfoundry.com/Facit), [JAF Zalamander](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202233415/http:/justanotherfoundry.com/Zalamander), and [JAF Mashine](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202233415/http:/justanotherfoundry.com/Mashine) for less than half the previous price now!  
The [JAF Lapture](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202233415/http:/justanotherfoundry.com/Lapture) family package with 24 fonts is now only â‚¬ 239 (about $ 350).
author: Tim Ahrens

comments.content: I wasn't even aware of these, Tim! Facit looks very nice.
